tips.title: Tips and tricks
tips.intro: Simple ways to get the most out of MoneyBear and keep your money decisions clear.

sections.title: Start with your essentials
items: Connect your main accounts and confirm the categories are correct.
Set a realistic monthly budget so the overview stays meaningful.
Pin the most important categories to your dashboard.

sections.title: Let MoneyBear guide you
items: Create saving goals and track progress week by week.
Turn on alerts for unusual spending or low balances.
Use recurring expense reminders to avoid surprises.

sections.title: Build a weekly habit
items: Review your week in 5 minutes and adjust your plan.
Tag bigger purchases so you can find them quickly later.
Compare this month with last month to spot trends.
